API Collection# Audio Session Errors

## [Topics](/documentation/AudioToolbox/1618373-audio-session-errors#topics)

### [Constants](/documentation/AudioToolbox/1618373-audio-session-errors#Constants)

[`var kAudioSessionNoError: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionnoerror)No error has occurred.[`var kAudioSessionNotInitialized: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionnotinitialized)An Audio Session function was called without first initializing the session. To avoid this error, call the `AudioSessionInitialize` function before attempting to use the session.[`var kAudioSessionAlreadyInitialized: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionalreadyinitialized)The `AudioSessionInitialize` function was called more than once during the lifetime of your application.[`var kAudioSessionInitializationError: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessioninitializationerror)There was an error during audio session initialization.[`var kAudioSessionUnsupportedPropertyError: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionunsupportedpropertyerror)The audio session property is not supported.[`var kAudioSessionBadPropertySizeError: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionbadpropertysizeerror)The size of the audio session property data was not correct.[`var kAudioSessionNotActiveError: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionnotactiveerror)The audio operation failed because your applicationâ€™s audio session was not active.[`var kAudioServicesNoHardwareError: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudioservicesnohardwareerror)The audio operation failed because the device has no audio input available.[`var kAudioSessionNoCategorySet: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionnocategoryset)The audio operation failed because it requires the audio session to have an explicitly-set category, but none was set. To use a hardware codec you must explicitly initialize the audio session and explicitly set an audio session category.[`var kAudioSessionIncompatibleCategory: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionincompatiblecategory)The specified audio session category cannot be used for the attempted audio operation. For example, you attempted to play or record audio with the audio session category set to `kAudioSessionCategory_AudioProcessing`.[`var kAudioSessionUnspecifiedError: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionunspecifiederror)An unspecified audio session error has occurred. This typically results from the audio system being in an inconsistent state.
